content.text:
# Dlawarpur

Dlawarpur, also spelled Dilawarpur, is a village of Kharian Tehsil, Gujrat District, Punjab, Pakistan. It is a union council of Kharian tehsil and 6 miles (11 km) from Kotla Arab Ali Khan, going east on the Kotlaâ€“Jalalpur Sobtian (Nikka Jalalpur) road.
